title: Amazing traditional food
text: Enjoy 3 days of authentic italian mountain food, straight from ancient, simpler times.

title: Speak the same language
text: The event is invite-only and you will spend time with like-minded but diverse and extremely impressive people.

title: Alpine dinner
text: A new alpine experience centered on quality of food. We will start with a dinner in an amazing chalet, surrounded by the peace of nature.

title: Wellness
text: A new alpine experience centered on quality of life. We will have an amazing SPA aimed at restoring your physical and spiritual balance.

title: Yoga
text: Regenerate your mind-body connection with our Yoga instructors, in the peace and tranquillity of a mountain wilderness.

title: Professional apline guides
text: We will be joined by professional, licensed alpine guides and professional mountaneers.

title: Hiking
text: Hiking in the Dolomites, an absolute mecca for outdoor enthusiast, trails which cross majestic mountains and expert alpine guides.

title: Astronomical exploration
text: Do you ever find yourself starting up at the stars? The sky's observation through professional telescopes to have a look at the infinite.
